story:
Short Summary

As we have had the opportunity to perform songs from our debut EP "Caroline," we have heard very similar feedback that has inspired us to work with new producers out of state. With about 40 new songs in our arsenal and a relentless determination to make this our best work possible, we have decided that the time has come to work with a producer who can take our music to the next level.  We take this decision of who to work with on this second EP very seriously.  After what seemed like endless research, we have concluded that producers Sahaj Ticotin and Bob Marlette are the best men for the job.  Both Sahaj Ticotin and Bob Marlette have worked with bands like Shinedown, Starset, Rob Zombie, Ozzy Osbourne, Motley Crue, Default, Three Days Grace, and many other industry powerhouses.  They understand that emotion is the core of our sound and establishing an intimate connection with our fans is our number one priority.  Their state of the art studio in Burbank, California is where we are planning on recording our second EP this coming March 2019, with your help.
  
Due to the high costs that come with recording such as studio time, travel, lodging, and marketing, we are asking for our fans, to help us make this a reality.  Our goal is to raise at least $6,000 over the 60-day allotted period to take care of these expenses and provide you with the next chapter of the Citizen Soldier story.  We have included some exciting reward options for those who contribute.  Please take a look at those and remember that no matter how small, any contribution means the world to us.  For those who cannot afford to contribute, we want you to know that we still are so grateful for your support and ask that you share our music with your family and friends.  There are so many ways to help, and we thank you in advance for doing so.

We promise you this:  We want to make this our most passionate, emotional, and honest work to date.  You will be able to hear the relentless work that goes into it and you will be proud that you decided to be a part of its creation.  We're forever grateful for each and every one of you. Thank you for passionately supporting the art you love, time and time again. We could not do any of this without your generosity. 

For those that want to donate via PayPal instead, you can do so on our website http://citizensoldierofficial.com

We can't wait to show you what's in store.

Citizen Soldier

story:
Our Story

Three of the members of Mayan Fox are related. We've been racking our brains trying to work out how we can get to Canada to see our beautiful Cousin who has been given only months to live. Then we remembered we have a band. BAND TOUR TO CANADA plan was born. So Mayan Fox have applied to play at NXNE (one of the biggest music conferences in the world) and are in the process of planning the rest of the tour. As we are an independent band everything we do is self, family and friends funded. So far we've released an album, toured NZ and played some incredible slots at festivals.


The Impact

We're hoping to WOW crowds throughout Canada with our infectious music and passion for playing live. We are also excited at the prospect of playing to loads of family and friends in Canada, especially our cousin Roxy.


What We Need & What You Get

We are engaging in local fundraising for our flights and extras and are hoping to raise enough on indiegogo to get us around while we are in Canada.  We have number crunched, and will need $5000 for our tour vehicle, petrol and accommodation. Anything on top (yes we're being optimistic) will help with flight costs as we are trying to raise this individually instead of as a band! If we don't quite make our goal on indiegogo, we will still go ahead with the tour, but will have to do a lot more work locally, to cover it.

We are happy to sing and write you songs, send you albums, t-shirts and thank you cards for the support you give us :) Not to mention a play by play on all our activities. It's our adventure that you are all invited to be a part of! 


Other Ways You Can Help

If funds are strapped at the moment we would still love and appreciate your support. You can help us by visiting any of our band sites and listening to our music. Just for reading this far, you have made our day and you can download a free track from the second link below:

www.mayanfox.com

www.triplejunearthed.com/mayanfox

www.myspace.com/mayanfox

www.youtube.com/themayanfox

www.facebook.com/mayanfoxofficial


OK that's probably enough links, ha! 

So finally if you could e-mail, facebook or just share this project in anyway possible to everyone you know and encourage them to get behind us we will be truly grateful. Thanks in advance from all the Foxies.
